panels.title: State DBÏóê ÏöîÏ≤≠ÌïòÎäî Ï¥àÎãπ  SQL Query Í∞úÏàò
SequencerÍ∞Ä State DBÏóê ÏöîÏ≤≠ÌïòÎäî ÏøºÎ¶¨ Î°úÍ∑∏ (INSERT, UPDATE Îßå)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM state.batch
ORDER BY batch_num DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT *
FROM state.sequences
ORDER BY from_batch_num DESC
LIMIT 501

SELECT batch_num, block_num, block_hash, parent_hash, state_root, received_at, created_at
FROM state.l2block
ORDER BY block_num DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT batch_num
FROM state.batch
ORDER BY batch_num DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT l2_block_num
FROM state.transaction
ORDER BY  l2_block_num DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT block_num, tx_hash, contract_address, effective_gas_price, status, cumulative_gas_used, gas_used
FROM state.receipt
ORDER BY block_num DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT block_num, received_at
FROM state.block
ORDER BY block_num DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Recent L1 Block synced by Synchronizer

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM state.transaction
ORDER BY  l2_block_num DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', generated_time) AS minute,
  COUNT(*) AS row_count
FROM
  generate_series(
    (SELECT MIN(created_at) FROM monitored_txs),
    (SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM monitored_txs),
    '1 minute'
  )
  AS generated_time
LEFT JOIN
  monitored_txs ON generated_time <= created_at AND created_at < generated_time + interval '1 minute'
GROUP BY
  1
ORDER BY
  1 DESC;

SELECT block_num
FROM state.monitored_txs_history
ORDER BY nonce DESC , updated_at DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Recent L1 Block Which Has Monitored Tx

targets.rawSql:
SELECT updated_at, owner, id, status, history, block_num, from_addr, to_addr, created_at, valid_from, valid_to
FROM state.monitored_txs_history
ORDER BY nonce DESC , updated_at DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT *
FROM state.virtual_batch
ORDER BY batch_num DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT *
FROM state.verified_batch
ORDER BY batch_num DESC
LIMIT 100
